text: Released in 1981, Rockihnroll is the sixth studio album by Greg Kihn and the third album as The Greg Kihn Band.Gregkihn.com It produced the band's second highest-charting single to date, "The Breakup Song (They Don't Write 'Em)." ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" |- !Chart (1981) !Peak position |- |Australia (Kent Music Report) | style="text-align:center;"|72 |} ==Personnel== *Greg Kihn - lead vocals, rhythm guitar *Dave Carpender - lead guitar, backing vocals *Gary Phillips - keyboards, backing vocals *Steve Wright - bass, backing vocals, keyboards *Larry Lynch - drums, backing vocals, percussion ==Production== *Producer: Matthew King Kaufman *Engineers: Don Cody, Richard Corsello *Mastering: George Horn *Art direction: Ron Coro, Norm Ung *Artwork/Design: Mike Fink *Logistics: Brian Murray ==References== Category:1981 albums Category:Greg Kihn albums Category:Beserkley Records albums
title: RocKihnRoll
